text: This is a list of comets bearing names, as opposed to comets named with codes (as for example P/1999 J6): ;Interstellar comets * 2I/Borisov, is the first observed interstellar comet https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jagiellonian_University ; Great comets * Aristotle's Comet * Caesar's Comet * Donati's Comet * Halley's Comet * Comet Skjellerup–Maristany * Comet Arend–Roland * Comet Mrkos * Comet Seki-Lines * Comet Ikeya–Seki * Comet Bennett * Comet Kohoutek * Comet West * Comet Hyakutake * Comet Hale–Bopp * Comet McNaught * Comet Lovejoy ;Numbered comets * List of numbered comets == See also == * List of interstellar comets * List of astronomical objects named after people ==References== Category:Lists of comets comets simple:List of comets
title: List of comets bearing names
